Dirk Serries' Microphonics.title: Live At 4AD Diksmuide Belgium. May 8th 2013
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.credits:
released May 16, 2020
            
            Performed live at 4AD, Diksmuide (Belgium) May8th 2013. 

Sound engineer : Ronald Mariën.

Recorded by 4AD.

Remastered by Dirk Serries.



Instruments : electric guitar, analog and digital effects.



Photography by Martina Verhoeven.  www.martinaverhoeven.com

Dirk Serries' Microphonics.title: microphonics VI - XX
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.about: 5LP box-set that collects all 5 live albums (in three editions : gold, white and grey 180gram vinyl). The box is white and comes with a paper banner holding all information, plus additional cardboard sleeves to accommodate the previous 4 releases in the series and replace their clear PVC sleeves.
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.credits:
released August 12, 2016
            
            1976 Gibson Les Paul Custom, Fender Hot Rod Deluxe 112 Tube

Dirk Serries' Microphonics.title: microphonics XXI-XXV mounting among the waves, there's a light in vein. the burden of hope across thousands of rivers.
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.about:
2x10" + CD (in black, white and marbled editions) 2013.

CD (deluxe japanese cardboard gatefold sleeve with inner card sleeve) 2013.
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.credits:
released August 12, 2016
            
            Gibson Les Paul guitars, Fender Twin Reverb, analog & digital effects.

All songs written and performed by Dirk Serries 2010-2012.



Mastered by James Plotkin.



Photography by Martina Verhoeven. Design by Carl Glover.

trackinfo.title: XXIII there's a light in vein

Dirk Serries' Microphonics.title: microphonics XXVI-XXX : resolution heart
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.credits:
released November 18, 2016
            
            Construction & recording 2013-2016. Performed, mixed by Dirk Serries. Mastered by Taylor Deupree at 12k mastering.



Instruments : electric guitar, electric violin, fender rhodes, analog and digital effects.



Photography by Martina Verhoeven. Design by Carl Glover.



This is the end. Play louder.



“they move in utter emptiness, let their minds meander in the great nothingness.” lao-tzu

Dirk Serries' Microphonics.title: microphonics I-V
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.about:
180gram LP (in two editions : black and clear vinyl) december 2008.

CD (deluxe japanese cardboard sleeve with obi and inner card sleeve)
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.credits:
released August 12, 2016
            
            Electric Guitar [1976 Gibson Les Paul Custom / Fender Hot Rod Deluxe 112 Tube Amplifier], Effects.



Performance/Recording : july 8th 2008, High Lake Hill Studio (Brecht, Belgium)

Engineer : Bart Van Lier. Recording Tools : 2x Shure SM57, 2x AKG C414, 1x Sennheiser MD421, 1x Sennheiser E906, Mindprint DTC (dual tube channel), Digidesign pre-amp, Pro-tools 7.3.



Photography by Martina Verhoeven. Graphic design by Carl Glover.

Inside cover photography by Charles Beterams.

Dirk Serries' Microphonics.title: XII tour edition
Dirk Serries' Microphonics.credits:
released August 12, 2016
            
            1976 Gibson Les Paul Custom, [Fender Hot Rod Deluxe 112 Tube Amplifier.



Performance/Recording : The home studio, January/February 2010.

Recording Tools : 1 X shure sm57, 1 X Sennheiser e606, Pro-tools.



Photography by Martina Verhoeven. Design by Carl Glover.



Limited edition of 250 copies, sold during the Microphonics 2010 tour.

photography by Martina Verhoeven. design by Carl Glover.
